block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Year 2021 is the year of the Ox. To celebrate, the first tutorial of the year is this origami bull designed by John Montroll. this model is slightly on the difficult side. I would recommend you to start with a large piece of square paper 20 cm x 20 cm (9 in x 9 in). In this tutorial I cut a square sheet out of a letter size paper to fold this origami Cow. Happy 2021 and Enjoy! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art Origami Bull Tutorial timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:20 Paper Size Information 0:30 Cutting a Square Sheet from a Letter Size paper 2:00 Start Folding 3:20 Sectioning the paper for the Head and the Body of the Bull 6:25 Folding the base for the Head of the Bull 6:52 Left Horn of the Bull 10:48 Right Horn of the Bull 13:40 Folding the base for the Rear legs of the Bull 14:55 Folding the base for the Front legs of the Bull 16:55 Pre-creasing the Tail of the Bull 18:25 Lowering the Head of the Bull 20:11 Folding the Front legs of the Bull 20:42 Folding the Tail legs of the Bull 20:10 Arcing the back of the Bull 22:05 Folding the Head of the Bull 22:45 Folding the Horns of the Bull 25:36 Folding the Ears of the Bull 26:24 Folding the Nose of the Bull 26:24 Aching the Neck of the Bull 26:37 Aching the Neck of the Bull 27:31 Folding the Hooves of the Bull 28:09 Shaping the Body of the Bull 29:10 Standing the Bull
